name: Pipl
description: This app integrates with Pipl to perform an investigative action

actions.description: Validate API Key with Pipl server

actions.verbose: Please enter all the information you have about the person you're searching for. At least one field is required: Email, Phone, Username, Url, Name (First + Last), or Full Address (House Number + Street + City + State).

example_values: Field Reporter at The Daily Planet (2000-2012)
City `Smallville` does not exist in provided state KS. It is ignored.
